data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 1,763 people in the state of Saint Paul Capisterre who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Paul Capisterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Saint Paul Capisterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Saint Paul Capisterre. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 550 believers in Saint Paul Capisterre, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Dieppe Bay Town
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Dieppe Bay Town, Saint Paul Capisterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Saint Paul Capisterre.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Saint Paul Capisterre.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.focus_label: Saint Paul Capisterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis
data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Paul Capisterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis has a population of 2,500.

We estimate Saint Paul Capisterre has 550 people who might know Jesus, 1,763 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 187 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Saint Paul Capisterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist
